You could use this function to view my ART:

```
#install.packages("ggplot2") #download ggplot package
library(ggplot2)

make_art <- function(){
set.seed(123)
ggplot(data = mpg, 
aes(x = displ, y = hwy, fill=fl)) +
geom_point(aes(color=fl), show.legend=FALSE) +
theme_void() +
scale_fill_brewer(palette="Blues")
}
  
```
